title: Which is more powerful, the United States or the United Kingdom? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as Security Council of the UN is concerned, both have equal powers to veto and thus, on that front, they are equal. Both are nuclear powers but United States’ nuclear arsenal and military strength is much higher than the United Kingdom by sheer numbers. The UK mostly plays second fiddle to the United States in most of their military operations. They might have had high level of influence going forward as a major nation in a very strong 28 member bloc (European Union), but now that they are in the process of walking out of the Union, the UK could only be a lackey of the United States in terms of international influence. Thus, it is beyond doubt that the United States is more powerful. To quote James Hacker from the British satire, Yes Minister, ‘We are no real power, we are just a sort of an American missile base’.
